transcript: And I, you know, I mean, I said I was sorry and I brought it back to her kind of and I put it on the ground and she was like, no, it's fine. She's like, I'd rather have her back, honestly.

segments.text: And I, you know, I mean, I said I was sorry and I brought it back to her kind of and I put it on the ground and she was like, no, it's fine.
She's like, I'd rather have her back, honestly.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: And I, you know, I mean, I said I was sorry and I brought it back to her kind of and I like put it on the ground and she was like, no, it's fine.  She was like, I would rather have her back, honestly.
